name: Fisherman of the Dawn
description:
This fisherman has his own ways of catching fish. He does it early and he does it with his bow and arrows. Because he is the Fisherman of the Dawn!

See how many fish you can catch!

CONTROLS : Left mouse button. ESCAPE to quit. F5 to restart.

Fisherman of the Dawn was made in 2 hours as a part of a challenge.

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
